TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InertiaExpansionBehavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制調整大小操作在慣性期間的減速。

span.span: Controls the deceleration of a resizing manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您指定的擴充操作時慣性的行為。The class specifies how a expansion manipulation behaves when it is inertia. 使用屬性事件，以執行下列動作：Use the property in the event to do the following: - 藉由設定開始時指定慣性的初始速度屬性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 慣性結束藉由設定時，指定所需的擴充操作的屬性。Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 設定指定慣性所需的減速屬性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定這些屬性時，其他的屬性變更為有值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下列範例所示事件處理常式，並設定所需的減速的轉譯、 擴充，以及使用慣性期間的旋轉。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double DesiredDeceleration { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定調整大小變慢的速率 (以每平方毫秒 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 數為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate that resizing slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per square milliseconds.

value.span: 調整大小變慢的速率 (以每平方毫秒 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 數為單位)。

span.span: The rate that resizing slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per square milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定所需的減速慣性。Use the property to specify the desired deceleration of the inertia. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定這些屬性時，其他的屬性變更為有值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: The property is set to infinity.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Vector DesiredExpansion { System::Windows::Vector get(); void set(System::Windows::Vector value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在慣性結束時項目調整大小的量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount the element resizes at the end of inertia.

value.span: 在慣性結束時項目調整大小的量。

span.span: The amount the element resizes at the end of inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用慣性結束時指定的操作所需的擴充屬性。Use the property to specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定這些屬性時，其他的屬性變更為有值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
